custom-sql.sql:
SELECT vbpq_entry.entryId, vbpq_entry.departmentId, vbpq_entry.categoryId, vbpq_entry.docTypeId, vbpq_entry.companyId, vbpq_entry.groupId, vbpq_entry.userId, vbpq_entry.userName, vbpq_entry.entryName, vbpq_entry.entryCode, vbpq_entry.entryDesc, vbpq_entry.fileAttachmentURL, vbpq_entry.publicatorName, vbpq_entry.createDate, vbpq_entry.modifiedDate, vbpq_entry.publishDate, vbpq_entry.executeDate, vbpq_entry.expirationDate, vbpq_entry.neverExpired, vbpq_entry.active_
FROM vbpq_entry
WHERE (UPPER(vbpq_entry.entryCode) LIKE ? OR UPPER(vbpq_entry.entryName) LIKE ?)
AND (vbpq_entry.groupId = ?)
ORDER BY publishDate DESC
LIMIT ?,?

SELECT vbpq_entry.entryId, vbpq_entry.departmentId, vbpq_entry.categoryId, vbpq_entry.docTypeId, vbpq_entry.companyId, vbpq_entry.groupId, vbpq_entry.userId, vbpq_entry.userName, vbpq_entry.entryName, vbpq_entry.entryCode, vbpq_entry.entryDesc, vbpq_entry.fileAttachmentURL, vbpq_entry.publicatorName, vbpq_entry.createDate, vbpq_entry.modifiedDate, vbpq_entry.publishDate, vbpq_entry.executeDate, vbpq_entry.expirationDate, vbpq_entry.neverExpired, vbpq_entry.active_
FROM vbpq_entry
WHERE (UPPER(vbpq_entry.entryCode) LIKE ? OR UPPER(vbpq_entry.entryName) LIKE ?)
AND (vbpq_entry.departmentId = ?)
AND (vbpq_entry.categoryId = ?)
AND (vbpq_entry.docTypeId = ?)
AND (vbpq_entry.expirationDate <= ?)
AND ((vbpq_entry.expirationDate >= ?) OR (vbpq_entry.expirationDate = 1))
AND vbpq_entry.publishDate >= ?
AND vbpq_entry.publishDate <= ?
AND (vbpq_entry.groupId = ?)
ORDER BY publishDate DESC LIMIT ?,?
